BlobLike<AttachmentMimeType>.description: i.e. a DOM Blob or a fetch-blob Blob

response.description: i.e. a DOM Blob or a fetch-blob Blob

afterID.description: Events are returned in an arbitrary stable order. When `afterID` is set, only events after that event's ID in the stable order will be returned. You can combine this parameter with `limit` to page through results.

entityID.description: When set, only events with matching `entityID` will be returned.

POST.description:
encode with multipart/form-data, with the file in part named "file"
make sure to include Content-Type heading for your attachment
returns application/json encoded ResponseObject<"attachmentIDReference", AttachmentID, AttachmentIDReference>
